subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Two goals by Obafemi Martins lifted the Sounders to a 3-1 victory at Yankee Stadium as New York City F.C.’s struggles continued in its first M.L.S. season.
snippet: Two goals by Obafemi Martins lifted the Sounders to a 3-1 victory at Yankee Stadium as New York City F.C.’s struggles continued in its first M.L.S. season.
